official_title: A bill to withhold funding authorized under the American Rescue Plan Act from any State or unit of local government that provides relief funds or monetary payments through a program exclusively targeting illegal immigrants.
short_title: No Bailouts for Illegal Aliens Act
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text:
No Bailouts for Illegal Aliens Act

This bill withholds funding authorized under the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 from any state or unit of local government that fails to certify that it is not providing relief funds or monetary payments that are targeted exclusively to individuals who are believed to be unlawfully present in the United States.
